feed.title: SAP Community - SAP BTP, ABAP environment
feed.subtitle: SAP BTP, ABAP environment Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Need API to Trigger Outbound Payment Status After Bank Rec (IHC Scenario)
entry.content:
Hello Community,

We are working on a scenario in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508 and need guidance on the best approach for an integration.

Scenario Overview:

We have implemented Inhouse Cash (IHC) with Payment Orders.

Supplier Invoices are created and tagged in a third-party system.

These invoices are successfully sent to and processed within S/4HANA.

The payment process runs in S4, and bank statements are posted using in S4 viaBANK_STATEMENT_POST_IN API to perform reconciliation.

Our Requirement:
Immediately after the bank statement is posted and invoices are reconciled (marked as paid in S4), we need to send the payment status (e.g., "Cleared" or "Paid") back to the third-party system via a pre-built interface.

We’ve Researched and aware that BusinessPartnerPaymentStatus OData API to read the status, but we need a trigger to push the data. We have explored Outbound Services (SOAP) but are unsure which one is raised post-bank reconciliation.

My Question:
What is the recommended API or Event we can leverage to trigger our logic after a successful BANK_STATEMENT_POST_IN. Our goal is to identify all invoices paid during that reconciliation run and push their status out to third party system.

We would greatly appreciate if you share your expertise :

The specific Business Event or Outbound Service that is triggered by a bank statement posting/reconciliation.

If a direct API is not available, what is the recommended extension strategy (e.g., a side-by-side extension listening to an event) to achieve this in the public cloud?

Thank you in advance for your time and expertise.

Regards,

Mahavir

entry.title: SAP BTP Trial : Select Transport Request "No change recording enabled for package"
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am currently working on a SAP Fiori / RAP project in BTP Trial. I created an instance of type service ABAP Environment and a service key whose URL I entered in Eclipse IDE for the configuration of an ABAP Cloud project. The trial period having ended, I no longer have access to my package and therefore created a new instance and a new service key to recreate the backend of my project.

But nom, when creating a package, I can no longer select a transport request or create a new one and it is marked 'No change recording enabled for package'.


Moreover, if I still create the package and create tables inside it for example, certain database tables having the same name as my previous tables, eclipse displays an error message that there is already a table with this name.


How can I resolve the package selection issues preventing me from making the link between my back on Eclipse and my front on Visual Studio?

Thanks in advance !

entry.title: Can't pull repo https://github.com/SAP-samples/abap-file-uploader
entry.content:
I am usning SAP BTP Trial account and trying to pull the repo https://github.com/SAP-samples/abap-file-uploader

after completion of the process my Package gets deleted on it's own few times and pull of repo also gets failed. I don't understand what I am doing wrong. I would really appreciate if you could help. 
Thanks in advance

entry.title: Skip Due Date Check for Specific Purchase Orders in MIGO
entry.content: When performing goods receipt in MIGO, for some purchase orders I don’t want the system to perform the due date check. How can I skip the due date check? How can this be implemented? I tried using MB_MIGO_BADI, but it didn’t work.

entry.title: SAP ui5 apps migration from WEBIDE to BTP BAS while deploying getting 403 error
entry.content:
Hi all,

we are trying to migrate apps from webide to BTP BAS.

step1: we are exported project from webide.

step2: we imported into BAS and then started migration and selected the S08 destination.

step3: after selecting the destination we have run the terminal and given npm i command.

step4: now we have done another comand npx fiori add deploy-config.

step5: now we have run npm run deploy command and gave "Yes".

step6:now we have got an error that Request failed with status code 403. Guided Answers troubleshooting guide available at https://ga.support.sap.com/dtp/viewer/index.html#/tree/3046/actions/57266

entry.title: How to get SAP BTP Competency after successfully creating a BTP Project.
entry.content:

We have successfully created SAP BTP Project using BAS and BTP Subaccount.

We want to get the SAP BTP Competency for our project as a SAP Partner

Could anyone provide any defined process or steps to get the competency

entry.title: SAP BTP Trial Account Published Services Not Working
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have published few services in SAP BTP Trial Account, and these services are not working at all but old services are working fine.

  1. For V2 service the preview is total blank
  2. For V4 it is popping up "Could not open App. Please try again later."
  3. For Service URL it is giving error "The request has been blocked by UCON.

Please find the attached screenshot for reference.  Has anyone experienced this issue.

entry.title: RAP Error: Mapping Declared but Table Not Recognized, Plus Warning Messages
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I’m working on a RAP (ABAP RESTful Application Programming) scenario and encountering the following issues:

1. Error in Action: Even though I’ve added the proper mapping and declared the same table in my behavior definition, I still get an error on the action.

Could anyone suggest what else I should verify to resolve this issue?

2. Warnings: Alongside the above error, I’m seeing two warning messages that I don’t understand how to address. What are the common causes of such warnings, and how should they typically be resolved in RAP scenarios?

a. "A mapping for type "table" cannot be introduced in "entities."

b. "Association "_CONTRACTHDR" requires an alias. Since none was specified, "CONTRACTHDR" has been derived from the association name." (This comes on nested composition).

entry.title: What end-to-end testing tools are best for SAP BTP (BAS) applications with CDS views and SAPUI5?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) projects deployed on SAP BTP that use CDS views as the data model and SAPUI5 for the front end.

I would like to implement end-to-end testing for these applications. I am familiar with general-purpose tools like Playwright or WebdriverIO, but I am not sure if they are the best fit when testing applications in the SAP ecosystem (especially those with CDS/OData services and SAPUI5).

  • Has anyone successfully used Playwright or WebdriverIO for BAS/SAPUI5 projects?

  • Are there recommended frameworks or libraries specifically designed for UI5 applications?

  • What are the best practices for handling such tests?

  • Any tutorials, examples, or community resources you could share?

Thanks in advance for your insights!

entry.title: Custom Entity as ABAP Cloud form data provider leading entity
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Can a ABAP RAP custom entity be used as a leading entity of a form data provider? I am working on embedded steampunk of S/4HANA Cloud 2508 version and have built a form object with a service definition where I have exposed a custom entity as a leading entity but the form object is erroring out.

I have added necessary annotations to service definition and the custom entity respectively. These annotations works for a CDS view entity but not for a custom entity or a CDS view defined using 'define view' syntax.

Does it mean that a custom entity cannot be used in form object?

@PascalBremer 

Best regards,

Sumit

entry.title: Failed to "Overwrite with Remote Topic Bindings" - S/4HANA Public Cloud and BTP ABAP
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Recently we've been integrating our S/4HANA Public Cloud and BTP ABAP with Event-Driven architecture using Direct Push-Based Integration. where Public Cloud is sending system and BTP ABAP is receiving system.

We've been successfully set everything up at the beginning with only Product Events. Now we've enhanced our event channel with Bill of Material Event and Change Master Event. In BTP ABAP everything looks fine.

However, when we try to "Overwrite with Remote Topic Bindings" in S/4 Public Cloud, it always fails and generates an ABAP runtime error.  

Does anyone have a hint, what could be the reason and how to solve it?

Many thanks in advance.

Best Regards,

Tan

entry.title: How to setup authentication in External FIORI APP for Communication User of OData in SAP Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I have created a new communication arrangement with new user for an Inbound OData Service in SAP PUBLIC CLOUD. I created destination in BTP with SAML Assertion. I created fiori app and deployed on to ABAP CLOUD. Everything is fine. The challenge is end user is already logged into PUBLIC CLOUD and when trying t open app for the first time before loading fiori app Communication User credentials popup is coming. In production there might be N no. of users who use this app. We are struck at a point how to make this authentication happens automatically using End User Credentials or how to setup a streamline for this authentication so that only Cloud Login is enough to load Application automatically. Everything is need to be done in SAP PUBLIC CLOUD not in on-premise.

 

SAP BTP cockpit SAP BTP Security SAP Fiori Cloud

entry.title: BTP ABAP Environment - Update Where-Used List
entry.content:
Dear Cloud-ers,

do You know how-to update the where-used-list on BTP ABAP Environment for standard repository objects ?
I did not find any alternative to saprseub report. Activation of standard objects is also not possible, which would implicitly update the where-used index.
So far using the ABAP Code Search plugin by DevEpos as an alternative, but I do not want to scan and wait a full scan for each time I am looking for something.

It is a BTP ABAP Free Tier Environment.

Thank You

Attila

entry.title: Need help in implementing "Multiple value selection" into "Value Help CDS view"
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I have requirement in SAP Public Cloud as follows –

I have implemented one CDS view Z_I_MATDOC_VH for value help for the standard field in which I’m fetching data from standard CDS view I_MaterialDocumentHeader_2. I have implemented necessary annotations in this custom CDS view.

There is another CDS  view Z_I_SELCTION for input selection. It has got 3 fields as follows –

-CompanyCode

-MaterialDocument

-MaterialDocumentYear

I’m using CDS view Z_I_MATDOC_VH into annotation -@Consumption.valueHelpDefinition : [{ entity: { name: ‘Z_I_MATDOC_VH’,

Element: ‘MaterialDocument’}}]

I’m also using annotation - @Consumption.filter.multipleSelection: true

The system is giving proper value help for field ‘MaterialDocument’.

But I’m able to select only one value from it.

My requirement is to select Multiple Values from the entries of Value Help.
Please help me with your suggestions and code snippets.

entry.title: how to start learning SAP - trainings, courses
entry.content:
Hi everybody, 

I’m new here and I have a question. I want to learn SAP and am new to this technology. Yes, I know it’s pretty tough with a lot to learn. But I want to do it because I want to change my profile. My background is data warehouse development, data modeling, and ETL development. Here I want to pivot instead of diving deeper into AWS or Azure cloud; I want to learn SAP, maybe SAP BTP and Cloud.

What do you think? Are these good topics for the future and with my background? Is there anyone here who can offer advice on which courses and trainings to start with for an introduction?

entry.title: Login Failure to SAP BTP - ABAP Environment
entry.content:
I am writing to ask for assistance because I am unable to connect to the ABAP Environment via ADT, which had been working fine until yesterday.

As usual, I expanded my project and navigated to the "Logon to the Service Instance" page, then clicked the "Open Logon Page in Browser" button to procee with login.

After entering my SAP BTP account credentials, the login process appeared to complete successfully. However, the authentication did not go through, and instead a Basic Authorization popup appeared, requesting a username and password.

I do not know which credentials are required for this popup, and I was able to use the system without any issues up until September 29. 

Finally, When I click the 'cancle' button, then page redirect to 401 error page...

 

Could you please advise me on how this issue can be resolved?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards.

entry.title: SAP BTP CI CD service for on premise S4 HANA systems RICEFW applications
entry.content:
Hi,

Can we use SAP BTP CI CD service for premise S4 HANA systems RICEFW applications deployment? There are only 4 pre-configured pipelines (Cloud Foundry Environment, SAP Fiori for ABAP Platform, SAP Integration Suite Artifacts, Kyma Runtime )available in CI CD service.  Which pipeline to use for this on premise scenario?

Example scenario :

On premise ABAP objects development like ABAP programs written in SE38, data dictionary objects created in SE11, enhancements, smartforms, webservices etc are developed in on-premise SAP S4 HANA development system. The transport request numbers are released and are pushed to Github repository via gCTS fiori app as commits.  SAP BTP CI CD pipeline job should trigger and perform the automated testing and deployment to target on premise systems(not the subaccounts but to on premise target systems like QA and production).

How to design this on-premise scenario with SAP BTP CI CD pipeline? How to automate and configure ATC checks, unit tests, integration testing, end to end testing?

Can anybody please provide inputs?

Regards,

Sunil

entry.title: Abap Trial rap100 exercise worked the first time but I now receive Service group not published error
entry.content:
After following the RAP100 Travel tutorial successfully, I thought I would then try a variant of it in a new Package in my TRL_EN Abap trial environment. Every time I publish my Service Binding, I can see it says 'successful' in the Display publishing proceses Fiori tile, but when I click on the preview button, the apps starts to open and terminates with 'please try later'. Dev Tools show the following message trying to open the metadata : Service group 'ZRAP100_UI_TRAVEL_O4_907' not published. without being able to access //IWFND/V4_ADMIN I'm not sure what I can do. 

Am I only allowed one Package or App with a Trial account ?

Any help much appreciated.

thanks

Neil
